greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients of derivatives of Eulerian number polynomials (A008292): p(x,n)=Sum[(-1)^j Binomial[n + 1, j](k + 1 - j)^n, {j, 0, k + 1}]; p'(x,n)=(d/dx)p{x,n).
comment: Row sums are: A001286 ( Lah numbers: (n-1)*n!/2. );
formula: p(x,n)=Sum[(-1)^j Binomial[n + 1, j](k + 1 - j)^n, {j, 0, k + 1}]; p'(x,n)=(d/dx)p{x,n); t(n,m)=Coefficients(p'(x,n)).
mathematica: t[n_, k_] := Sum[(-1)^j Binomial[n + 1, j](k + 1 - j)^n, {j, 0, k + 1}]; Table[D[Sum[t[n, k]*x^k, {k, 0, n - 1}], x], {n, 1, 10}]; Table[CoefficientList[D[Sum[t[n, k]*x^k, {k, 0, n - 1}], x], x], {n, 1, 10}]; Flatten[%]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Sep 24 2008
